statements: UPDATE NanoparticleSamples SET diameter = 15.2, surface_area = 100.5 WHERE sample_id = 1;
UPDATE NanoparticleSamples SET material_composition = 'Silver-Nickel Alloy', sample_name = 'Ag-Ni Sample' WHERE sample_id = 2;
UPDATE NanoparticleSamples SET diameter = 10.5, surface_area = 20.5 WHERE sample_id = 1;
UPDATE NanoparticleSamples SET sample_name = 'Updated Sample', material_composition = 'Gold (Au)' WHERE sample_id = 2;
UPDATE nanoparticle_samples SET particle_size = 25.5 WHERE sample_id = 1;
UPDATE sample_properties SET property_value = 'Round' WHERE property_name = 'Shape';
UPDATE nanoparticle_samples SET particle_size = 20.5, material_composition = 'Gold Nanoparticles' WHERE sample_id = 1;
UPDATE sample_properties SET property_value = 'Stable' WHERE property_name = 'Stability' AND sample_id = (SELECT sample_id FROM nanoparticle_samples WHERE sample_name = 'Sample1');
UPDATE nanoparticle_samples SET sample_name = 'Updated Name 1' WHERE sample_id = 1
UPDATE sample_properties SET property_value = 15.5 WHERE property_id = 3
UPDATE nanoparticle_samples SET sample_name = 'UpdatedSample1', sample_size = 25.5 WHERE sample_id = 1;
UPDATE sample_properties SET property_value = 10.5, property_name = 'UpdatedProperty' WHERE property_id = 1;
UPDATE nanoparticle_properties SET size = 25.5, surface_area = 120.75 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE sample_characteristics SET composition = 'Gold nanoparticles', purity = 0.95 WHERE sample_id = 3;
UPDATE nanoparticle_properties SET size = 15.2, surface_area = 25.6 WHERE name = 'Gold nanoparticle';
UPDATE sample_characteristics SET composition = 'Silver and Copper', density = 7.8 WHERE sample_id = 1234;
UPDATE nanoparticle_samples SET particle_shape = 'Spherical' WHERE sample_id = 1;
UPDATE sample_properties SET transparency = 'Opaque', magnetism = TRUE WHERE sample_id = 2;
UPDATE nanoparticle_samples SET particle_shape = 'Spherical', material_composition = 'Gold' WHERE sample_id = 1;
UPDATE sample_properties SET color = 'Blue', transparency = 'Opaque', magnetism = TRUE WHERE sample_id = 1;
